msg: Declare the <struts:message> tag to require an empty body, and allow

author: craigmcc
msg: Modify getScalarProperty() so that it deals with arrays of native types
as well, by using the just-patched getArrayProperty() method.

author: craigmcc
msg: Modify getArrayProperty() so that it deals correctly with arrays of primitive
types (like int), as well as arrays of objects.

author: craigmcc
msg: Enhance the rule matching behavior of Digester by also supporting wildcard
patterns.  For example, a rule for pattern "*/foo" will match a <foo> node
encountered anywhere in the XML document, no matter how deeply nested.  This
is very handy for processing recursive data structures.
